title: The Armor of God Week 1 with Heather Thompson Day
description:
This week, Raechel and Amanda kick off The Armor of God reading plan with author and speaker Dr. Heather Thompson Day. The three set the stage for the key passage in Ephesians, identifying who our enemy is and the different pieces of armor that God has equipped us with. Tune into this deep conversation about what it means to clothe ourselves with the armor of God in the midst of the very intense spiritual battle around us. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth The Armor of God reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop The Armor of God collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/the-armor-of-god-week-1-with-heather-thompson-day
